abstract.t: This document discusses the communication protocol between mobileaccess point and terminal. With the evolution of mobilecommunication, there are various kind of wireless communicationtechnologies such as WCDMA, LTE, WLAN, WiMAX, and TDS-CDMA et al.Each of these wireless communication technology has independentconnection, mobility and configuration management. This documentwould like to cover all these functions into a common groundespecially in the environment of multiple connections.
